alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Coastal York; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 6:36PM EST until January 30 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southern New Hampshire and south central and southwest Maine. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While snow accumulations may continue to change with storm track, the combination of falling snow and gusty winds may lead to blizzard or near-blizzard conditions at times.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Coastal York; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc
